 Stay informed with Slack notifications 

 Learn how notifications work and how to customize them to suit your needs. For example, you can easily create a custom schedule to automatically pause notifications in Slack during any time you specify.
 


 Whether you want to work distraction-free or be notified of the latest updates right away, it's all just a click away.
